mapper.select: SELECT i.id as itemId, i.character_id as characterId, i.name, i.detail, i.price, i.stock, i.sale_status as saleStatus, is_limited as isLimited, i.is_deleted isDeleted, i.image_path as imagePath, i.created_at as createdAt, i.updated_at as updatedAt, c.name as characterName FROM items i LEFT JOIN characters c ON i.character_id = c.id WHERE i.is_deleted = false ORDER BY i.id;

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.character_id as characterId, i.name, i.detail, i.price, i.stock, i.sale_status as saleStatus, is_limited as isLimited, i.is_deleted isDeleted, i.image_path as imagePath, i.created_at as createdAt,i.updated_at as updatedAt, c.name as characterName FROM items i LEFT JOIN characters c ON i.character_id = c.id WHERE i.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO items( character_id, name, detail, price, stock, sale_status, is_limited, image_path, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{character.id}, #{name}, #{detail}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{saleStatus}, #{isLimited}, #{imagePath}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.update: UPDATE items SET character_id = #{character.id}, name = #{name}, detail = #{detail}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, sale_status = #{saleStatus}, is_limited = #{isLimited}, image_path = #{imagePath}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id};
